meanings.definition: A large oval track for horse racing.
meanings.sent1: The hippodromes were filled with cheering fans on race day.
meanings.sent2: The jockeys raced around the hippodromes at top speed.
meanings.sent3: The hippodromes looked like giant horseshoes from above.
meanings.sent4: The excitement at the hippodromes was palpable as the horses thundered by.
meanings.sent5: The sun set over the hippodromes, casting a golden glow on the track.

meanings.definition: A building or stadium where horse races take place.
meanings.sent1: The hippodromes were beautifully decorated for the big race.
meanings.sent2: Fans gathered at the hippodromes to watch the thrilling races.
meanings.sent3: The hippodromes had a snack bar with the best hot dogs in town.
meanings.sent4: The hippodromes stood proudly in the center of the city, a symbol of tradition.
meanings.sent5: The lights of the hippodromes shone brightly in the night sky.
